title: Password changed, but no email sent to verified email address. What do?
body: How is this possible? How can my password for my other account be changed without sending a request email to my verified email address? Not only that, if I try password recovery, it doesn't send an email to the verified email. Yes, the region is correct and my caps lock is not on.

replies.body:
If your password was changed without you doing so, it's likely that your account has been compromised or 'hacked'. Since the password reset email never went to the email you registered the account to, it sounds like the email may have been changed as well.

Your best bet would be to reach out to our account agents through our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). We can't into too much detail on the boards, since we consider all your information private. Be sure to stay logged out of the support site when you submit that ticket!
